name: Van Huy
bio: 👨‍💻 Software Developer | ☕ Powered by caffeine | 🏃‍♂️ Exercise every day  | 🚀 Building cool stuff

tweets.text:
I am a Java Developer and a passion for building efficient, scalable software solutions. Through academic projects and personal learning, I have gained experience with Java frameworks like Spring and Hibernate, database management (MySQL), and RESTful APIs.

Eager to apply my skills in a professional setting, I bring a proactive mindset, a dedication to continuous learning, and a keen interest in problem-solving and innovation.

Let’s connect to create impactful solutions together!
